name: MOONZA Waterproof 55pcs Pokemon TCG Gold Card Box V Series Vmax Gx Playing Card

General.Other Features: This is a rare piece of artwork, made of high-quality gold foil material, waterproof, and more durable than ordinary paper cards. Put the latest 55 PCS cards in the cardholder and let them shine with your other cards.

Important Note.Important Note: The color of some product parts may vary from what is shown in the image.

Warranty.Covered in Warranty: warranty of the product is covered under manufacturing defects
Warranty.Not Covered in Warranty: Warranty does not cover damage caused to the product due to improper handling by customer.
Warranty.Warranty Summary: 1 year warranty provided by the manufacturer from date of purchase
